proposal: Diving into the spirit of $BWST, aiming to uplift minority businesses and entrepreneurs globally - a noble cause indeed! With 63 holders on the ETH network, you're laying down the foundations of a new Black Wall Street. Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools to further empower your community, turning every transaction into a step towards reviving a legacy. Let's build together, for every community member can be a builder.
